item.title: European markets lower as positive sentiment vanishes
item.description: European markets were trading in negative territory Tuesday as investors geared up for the latest U.S. inflation report this week.

item.title: Dodge maker Stellantis and China's CATL team up to build $4.3 billion EV battery plant in Spain
item.description: Stellantis and CATL have announced plans to jointly build a 4.1 billion euro ($4.3 billion) lithium iron phosphate battery plant in Spain.

item.title: Is this London’s best kept cultural secret? A royal palace turned parking lot is reinventing itself — again
item.description: Somerset House is known for its ice rink and movie screenings — but hundreds of artists work there too. In 2025, it will mark 25 years as a cultural c...

item.title: Stock futures are little changed after S&P 500, Nasdaq retreat from records: Live updates
item.description: The major averages are coming off of a losing session.

item.title: Surprise RBI governor pick signals India may cut rates as soon as February, economists say
item.description: India has appointed a new central bank governor in a surprising move that some experts say strengthens outlook for rate cuts early next year.
